overview_of_class:
Russian Poema (Long Narrative Poem)

Russian poema is a specific genre in Russian poetry that appeared in the 18th century and continues till now. Without knowing about its originality in Russian literary culture, it is impossible to imagine the development of Russian poetry through all its periods. The course covers all major poema masterpieces, including those by Pushkin, Baratynsky, Blok, Belyi, Tsvetaeva, Mayakovsky, Pasternak, and Akhmatova.
name: Russian Poetry
title: WCAS SLAVIC 437-1-1 Russian Poetry
